00020 AlternateRegister::AlternateRegister(QDomNode& registerNode):
00021 RegisterModel(registerNode), alternateGroups_(), alternateRegisterDef_() {
00022 
00023         for (int i = 0; i < registerNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00024                 QDomNode tempNode = registerNode.childNodes().at(i);
00025 
00026                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:alternateGroups")) {
00027 
00028                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00029                                 QString groupName = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00030                                 alternateGroups_.append(General::removeWhiteSpace(groupName));
00031                         }
00032                 }
00033         }
00034         alternateRegisterDef_ = QSharedPointer<RegisterDefinition>(
00035                         new RegisterDefinition(registerNode));
00036 
00037         // atleast one alternate group must be found
00038         if (alternateGroups_.size() == 0) {
00039                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Atleast one alternateGroup must be "
00040                                 "found in spirit:alternateRegister"));
00041         }
00042         return;
00043 }
00044 
00045 AlternateRegister::AlternateRegister( const AlternateRegister& other ):
00046 RegisterModel(other),
00047 alternateGroups_(other.alternateGroups_),
00048 alternateRegisterDef_() {
00049 
00050         if (other.alternateRegisterDef_) {
00051                 alternateRegisterDef_ = QSharedPointer<RegisterDefinition>(
00052                         new RegisterDefinition(*other.alternateRegisterDef_.data()));
00053         }
00054 }
00055 
00056 AlternateRegister& AlternateRegister::operator=( const AlternateRegister& other ) {
00057         if (this != &other) {
00058                 RegisterModel::operator=(other);
00059 
00060                 alternateGroups_ = other.alternateGroups_;
00061 
00062                 if (other.alternateRegisterDef_) {
00063                         alternateRegisterDef_ = QSharedPointer<RegisterDefinition>(
00064                                 new RegisterDefinition(*other.alternateRegisterDef_.data()));
00065                 }
00066                 else
00067                         alternateRegisterDef_ = QSharedPointer<RegisterDefinition>();
00068         }
00069         return *this;
00070 }
00071 
00072 AlternateRegister::~AlternateRegister() {
00073         alternateGroups_.clear();
00074         alternateRegisterDef_.clear();
00075 }
00076 
00077 void AlternateRegister::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00078         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:alternateRegister");
00079 
00080         // call base class to write itself
00081         RegisterModel::write(writer);
00082 
00083         // if no alternateGroups exist
00084         if (alternateGroups_.size() == 0) {
00085                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Atleast one alternateGroup must be "
00086                                 "found in spirit:alternateRegister"));
00087         }
00088         else {
00089                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:alternateGroups");
00090 
00091                 for (int i = 0; i < alternateGroups_.size(); ++i) {
00092                         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:alternateGroup",
00093                                         alternateGroups_.at(i));
00094                 }
00095 
00096                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:alternateGroups
00097         }
00098 
00099         // write register definition group is one exists
00100         if (alternateRegisterDef_) {
00101                 alternateRegisterDef_->write(writer);
00102         }
00103 
00104         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:alternateRegister
00105 }
00106 
00107 const QList<QString>& AlternateRegister::getAlternateGroups() const {
00108         return alternateGroups_;
00109 }
00110 
00111 RegisterDefinition* AlternateRegister::getAlternateRegisterDef() const {
00112         return alternateRegisterDef_.data();
00113 }
00114 
00115 void AlternateRegister::setAlternateGroups(
00116                 const QList<QString>& alternateGroups) {
00117         this->alternateGroups_.clear();
00118         this->alternateGroups_ = alternateGroups;
00119 }

00121 void AlternateRegister::setAlternateRegisterDef(
00122                 RegisterDefinition* alternateRegisterDef) {
00123         this->alternateRegisterDef_ = QSharedPointer<RegisterDefinition>(alternateRegisterDef);
